analysis.description:
BuddyToken.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x5b2073762788bee3434a804ebbbf3a801c3df82c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(reciver,amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x5b2073762788bee3434a804ebbbf3a801c3df82c.sol)
